(Received 29th.) 17152, Malleson telegraphs 20th December, repeating to Teheran : " Evidences of Bolshevik propaganda amongst local workers are reaching me from several sources. Line at present is to cause discontent amongst workers and(corrupt group) and regarding disparity of their wages and employers' profits."
